Ohana Mana Koa

Empowering Communities, Honoring Heritage.

Learn More About Us

Our Guiding Principles

Mission

Empower Native Hawaiian families, veterans, and underserved communities through culturally grounded programs.

Vision

Thriving, connected communities where Native Hawaiian values guide education, economy, and care.

Values

Kuleana, Aloha, Pono, Cultural Stewardship, Veteran Empowerment, Resilience, Community Before Self.

Rooted in Hawaiian Culture

Preserving traditions for future generations

Our Impact

500+

Families Served

50+

Veterans Supported

25

Programs Active

10

Years of Service

Join Us in Making a Difference

Your support helps us continue our vital work in the community.
